TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxExclusive5 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a maxExclusive-5.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType with maxExclusive value 0.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger maxExclusive-5.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-5-1.xml document which specifies valid value -99999999999999999999 for the nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-maxExclusive-5 element, sets the values: -1, -2222222222222 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger maxExclusive-5.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-5-1.xml document which specifies valid value -99999999999999999999 for the nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-maxExclusive-5 element, sets the values: 0, 1, 2222222222222 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger maxExclusive-5.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-maxExclusive-5 type, sets the values: -1, -2222222222222 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger maxExclusive-5.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-maxExclusive-5 type, sets the values: 0, 1, 2222222222222 and expects validation to fail.
